title: Unjust banning
body: I wish to speak to a representative of riot. I would like to discuss my ban as I believe it is unjust. I was called a moron and very vulgar names. but all I said was shut up and play I should be Permanently  banned!?   If someone from riot can get back to me if anyone has any contact info toa  riot employee that would be a big help.

I'm afraid I must say that this one is deserved. This is insulting and harassing other players, which is absolutely not okay, and absolutely punishable. There is not a circumstance where this behavior is considered acceptable.
You harassed your team and gave up. Seems like a valid punishment to me.

But I didn't I knew they where going to win. we had a AFk and their team was fed and grouped into our base with down inhib. So I said end. I still grouped and jumped on adc since I was talon. I didnt mean to proceive as giving up . And I didnt even mean to herrase we were joking at first. then after being called a moron and to kill my self I snapped a bit and said shut up. I didnt mean for it top come off that way
It doesn't matter if you think the game is over. You don't get to break the rules. And you certainly don't get to snap after your prior penalty warnings.

I only got punished once tho and how is me thinking the game is over break the rules as I’m still trying and I’m still playing to win how is that fair? And I shouldn’t be upset after being called a moron and very vulgar things? I’m human man and the fight was in all chat and I just said shut up and play. I really didn’t mean for it to come off the way it is because I can’t show u everything and the whole chat. But I was verbally attacked by my whole team for trying
What was the punishment?  Was it a chat ban or a 14 day ban?
Perma ban I feel that’s a bit over kill

14 Day ban. and for months I reformed and been the nicest player got to honors 4 and been active in the community as a possessive person. You have to believe me this was a slip up

I know that 14 days is the last chance but that an account can eventually get on better terms.  Riot doesn’t tell us how long it takes for this to happen though.  All you can do is send in a support ticket and hope for the best.  The forums aren’t the best place to get a ban overturned.  All we can do is offer and advice and maybe catch riots attention if we believe a ban was unjust (which I doubt will happen on your case as that only happens in fringe cases such as the Support Nunu who counted jg in high elo)
**thinking** that is not against the rules. Being a negative Nelly in chat and trying to ruin the morale of the team is against the rules.

I wasn’t trying to mess up morale I was just trying to. Have them finish the game so we can move on to a better game but I understand your view point :(  but I honestly didn’t mean for it to come off that way. I didn’t think asking the enemy team that’s in our base with a down inhib and waves pushed in and we have a afk to finish it was giving up and lowering moral

Your best best would be to send in a ticket to Player Support. The second best option would be to post your chat logs (and any punishment history) here and, if the community agrees with you, it may attract the attention of a Riot employee.
